content:
TITLE: Processing Field Parsing in DslParser
DESCRIPTION: This code illustrates the field parsing process in the DslParser class. It parses field name and type, then processes annotations and tags, with special handling for FK annotations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-DslParsingDoc.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
// 1) Parse the field NAME and TYPE
FieldNameAndTypeParser.parseFieldNameAndType(..)

// 2) Parse field ANNOTATIONS and TAGS
FieldAnnotationsAndTagsParser.parse(...)

// Keep Errors found

// Process all ANNOTATIONS found for this field
  // Special processing for "@FK" annotation 
  FieldFKAnnotationParser
  domainField.addFKDeclaration(fk);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Processing Link Annotations in Links Converter
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how link annotations are processed during the link creation phase. It initializes links with default values and applies various relationship annotations like @Embedded, @ManyToOne, and @OneToOne.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-DslParsingDoc.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
LinksAnnotationsProcessor.applyAnnotationsForLink(..)
@Embedded, @ManyToOne, @OneToOne, etc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Foreign Key in DSL
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the syntax for defining a foreign key with attributes in the Telosys DSL. It shows how to specify the foreign key name, entities involved, and the attribute mappings between them.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/TODO-ForeignKeys.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: DSL
CODE:
```
FK (name, e1, e2,
 list [
 - e1.attr1 -> e2.attrY
 - e1.attr2 -> e2.attrZ
 ] )
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Processing Attribute Annotations for Neutral Type Conversion
DESCRIPTION: This code shows how attribute annotations are processed during the conversion from domain model to DSL model. It applies various annotations related to id, value, type, database, and string parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-DslParsingDoc.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
AttribAnnotationsProcessor.applyAnnotationsForNeutralType(..)
   - @Id, @AutoIncremented
   - applyAnnotationsAboutValue(attribute, annotations);
   - applyAnnotationsAboutType(attribute, annotations);
   - applyAnnotationsAboutDatabase(attribute, annotations);
   - applyAnnotationsWithStringParameter(attribute, annotations);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Annotations for Neutral Type in DSL Parser
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the process of applying annotations for neutral types in attribute conversion. It includes inheriting from other annotations and applying specific annotations like DatabaseSize and DatabaseNotNull.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-NewAnnotationsConversion.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: pseudo
CODE:
```
AttribAnnotationsProcessor.applyAnnotationsForNeutralType(..)
Apply here [[[ DONE ]]]
+ inherit from other annotations 
    Examples :
    . DatabaseSize <- fieldSizeMax 
    . DatabaseNotNull <- fieldNotNull
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Foreign Keys in DSL Parser
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the creation of foreign keys declared with '@FK' annotations at the field level using the ForeignKeysBuilder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-NewAnnotationsConversion.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: pseudo
CODE:
```
ForeignKeysBuilder.buildForeignKeys(entity);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Annotations for Links in DSL Parser
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the process of applying annotations for links during the link conversion process. It also mentions the need to check annotation consistency, particularly for MappedBy and FK annotations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/doc/2021-11-NewAnnotationsConversion.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: pseudo
CODE:
```
LinksAnnotationsProcessor.applyAnnotationsForLink(..)
Apply here

+ check annotations consistency ?
    . MappedBy (xx) 
    . FK
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deprecated and New Foreign Key Methods in Java
DESCRIPTION: Lists the deprecated methods for retrieving database foreign keys and their new counterparts. This snippet is crucial for developers updating their code to use the latest API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/TODO-ForeignKeys.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Java
CODE:
```
getDatabaseForeignKeys() + databaseForeignKeysCount() : deprecated
getForeignKeys() + foreignKeysCount() : new
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Duplicate Field Test in Entity
DESCRIPTION: Code demonstrating the test case for checking duplicate field detection in an entity with different data types
SOURCE: https://github.com/telosys-tools-bricks/telosys-tools-dsl-parser/blob/master/TODO.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
entity.addField( buildField("foo", DomainNeutralTypes.STRING) );
entity.addField( buildField("foo", DomainNeutralTypes.INTEGER) );
```
